page1.title: Welcome! We are Setlone
page1.description: We are the first platform that integrates investment, consumption, fintech, and culture

page2.title: On our platform
page2.description: You can discover various things through SUTmembers. SUTmembers operates as a membership system, and you can use crypto cards and receive benefits when you sign up.

page3.title: Shop and earn rewards
page3.description: Get points as rewards for your purchases! Discover various products in our shopping mall

page4.title: Share fun and diverse content
page4.description: Upload posts and short videos to get likes! Likes are rewarded with SUT every day at 00:00!

native.title: Native Staking
native.description: Stake tokens directly on the blockchain network

lockup.title: Lockup vs Unlock Staking
lockup.description: Choose between locked and flexible staking options

liquid.title: Liquid Staking (LST)
liquid.description: Stake while maintaining liquidity with liquid staking tokens

restaking.title: Restaking
restaking.description: Restake your staked tokens for additional rewards

cefi.title: CeFi Staking
cefi.description: Centralized finance staking through trusted platforms

defi.title: DeFi Staking
defi.description: Decentralized finance staking on DeFi protocols

native.title: Native Staking
native.content: Native Staking allows you to stake tokens directly on the blockchain network using the native protocol. You participate directly in network security and consensus, earning rewards by staking native tokens.

lockup.title: Lockup vs Unlock Staking
lockup.content: Lockup Staking locks your tokens for a fixed period to earn higher rewards. Unlock Staking allows flexible withdrawal at any time, offering lower rewards but greater freedom in managing your assets.

liquid.title: Liquid Staking (LST)
liquid.content: Liquid Staking is an innovative way to earn rewards while maintaining liquidity of staked tokens. You receive Liquid Staking Tokens (LST) representing your staked tokens, which can be used in other DeFi protocols.

restaking.title: Restaking
restaking.content: Restaking allows you to stake already staked tokens again to earn additional rewards. You can stake across multiple protocols simultaneously to maximize returns.

cefi.title: CeFi Staking
cefi.content: CeFi (Centralized Finance) Staking provides staking services through trusted centralized platforms. It is user-friendly, stable, and offers professional management services.

defi.title: DeFi Staking
defi.content: DeFi (Decentralized Finance) Staking provides staking services through decentralized protocols. You interact directly with smart contracts without intermediaries, earning rewards in a transparent and open manner.

ethereum.title: Ethereum Node Participation
ethereum.description: Participate in Ethereum network nodes to earn rewards

bitcoin.title: Bitcoin
bitcoin.content: Bitcoin mining allows you to contribute to network security and earn rewards. You can generate stable income through professional mining equipment and pools.

ethereum.title: Ethereum Node Participation
ethereum.content: Participate in Ethereum network validation nodes to strengthen network security and earn rewards. You can generate passive income through staking.

coins.title: Mineable Coins
coins.content: Check the mining feasibility and profitability of various cryptocurrencies. We provide the latest mining information and market trends.

investment.title: Investment Game
investment.description: Investment and profit generation through games

casino.title: Online Casino
casino.content: We provide transparent and fair online casino games using blockchain technology. Smart contracts ensure the fairness of game results.

investment.title: Investment Game
investment.content: An innovative platform where you can generate investment returns while enjoying games. In-game activities are connected to real profits.

reward.title: Reward-based
reward.description: Crowdfunding where you receive rewards or products when the project succeeds

investment.title: Investment-based
investment.description: Crowdfunding where you invest in projects expecting returns

loan.title: Loan-based
loan.description: Crowdfunding where you lend to projects and receive interest

reward.title: Reward-based Crowdfunding
reward.content: A form of crowdfunding where you fund a project and receive promised rewards or products when the project succeeds. This is the typical model of product-based crowdfunding.

investment.title: Investment-based Crowdfunding
investment.content: A form of crowdfunding where you invest in a project expecting future returns. You can earn investment returns based on the project's success.

loan.title: Loan-based Crowdfunding
loan.content: A form of crowdfunding where you lend funds to a project and receive principal and interest after a set period. You can expect stable returns.

sellerket.title: Sellerket
sellerket.content: Sellerket is a global shopping mall platform where you can purchase various products from around the world in one place. We provide a safe and convenient shopping experience.

web3shopping.title: Web3 Shopping
web3shopping.content: An innovative shopping platform using Web3 technology. Instant payment is possible without SWIFT, and we provide secure transactions based on blockchain.

futures.title: Futures & Options
futures.description: AI-based futures and options auto trading

commodities.title: Gold, Commodities, etc.
commodities.description: AI-based gold and commodities auto trading

bonds.title: Bonds & Foreign Currency

crypto.title: Cryptocurrency
crypto.content: Automated cryptocurrency trading service using AI algorithms. Automatically captures optimal trading opportunities through real-time market data analysis and machine learning.

stocks.title: Foreign Stocks
stocks.content: AI-based automated foreign stock trading service. AI analyzes various opportunities in global stock markets and automatically makes investment decisions.

futures.title: Futures & Options
futures.content: AI-based automated futures and options trading service. AI manages risks and finds profit opportunities in complex derivative markets.

commodities.title: Gold, Commodities, etc.
commodities.content: AI-based automated gold and commodities trading service. AI analyzes commodity market volatility to pursue stable returns.

etf.title: Foreign ETF +
etf.content: AI-based automated foreign ETF trading service. AI analyzes various foreign ETFs and automatically executes diversification strategies.

bonds.title: Bonds & Foreign Currency
bonds.content: AI-based automated bonds and foreign currency trading service. AI analyzes opportunities in bond and foreign exchange markets to pursue stable returns.
